text: The Panther Clipper Mk II is the first large SCO-optimized ship in Elite Dangerous, featuring the MK II Cargo Rack module with a maximum cargo capacity of 1238 tons. It was introduced in the ARX release on 22 July 2025, with concept art revealed on 30 April 2025. Its predecessor, the Panther Clipper, first appeared in Frontier: Elite II as the largest ship in the game, capable of planetary bombardment and equipped with powerful shields.

The Panther Clipper Mk II is a Freighter manufactured by Zorgon Peterson, produced from 3311 to the present. It has a landing pad size of Large, accommodates 4 pilots, supports multicrew, and includes a fighter hangar. It features 1x Class 1, 1x Class 2, 1x Class 4, 2x Class 5, 3x Class 6, 2x Class 7, and 2x Class 8 internal compartments.

The Panther Clipper Mk II's outfitting includes four small hardpoints, each with a maximum class of 1, and four medium hardpoints, each with a maximum class of 2. It also has two large hardpoints, each with a maximum class of 3, and four utility mounts. The default systems include Lightweight Alloys for bulkhead, Power Plant for reactor bay, Thrusters, Frame Shift Drive (SCO), Life Support, Power Distributor, Sensors, and Fuel Tank.
